author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Lycée Français of Puducherry has announced the test for admission to its International Section of Excellence in Science (ISES) on February 7 for the academic year 2016-17.

The ISES is targeted at students who are exceptional in science enter the equivalent of class IX and complete schooling with a Baccalauréat specialised in science, the diploma awarded by the French Ministry of Education.

The ISES also gives students an opportunity to compete for the Bourse d’Excellence Major, a scholarship for higher education in France.

The school also has modules for non-French speaking students (6 to 14 years old) to help their integration into the French educational system.
title: ISES admission test on February 7
